settings.text_OsbEsC2Dg4EzUhrA: How are these different from regular underwear?
settings.text_TawrFZaUSQJsjymJ: Unlike regular underwear, Olora combines moisture-wicking technology, a breathable insert, and a wide gusset to actively prevent irritation and bacteria buildup, making it the most hygienic choice.
settings.text_ZyXynfdOAhQ5PcO2: How does your moisture-wicking technology actually work?
settings.text_UKOyvbwXYERkhJ4E: Our moisture-wicking technology combines advanced fabrics to keep you dry and comfortable. Nylon fibers are hydrophobic, pulling sweat away from your skin to the fabric‚Äôs surface through capillary action. The moisture is then evenly spread across the surface, where it evaporates quickly due to nylon‚Äôs breathable and quick-drying properties. Meanwhile, spandex ensures a snug fit, enhancing sweat transfer to the surface for efficient evaporation.
settings.text_q91X6ED2Rb4MhqUR: Why does it have a breathable padded insert?
settings.text_G88kPd4PAaAMnYGk: The breathable padded insert promotes airflow to reduce heat and moisture buildup, minimizing bacteria and odor. It also prevents front wedgies, helping to avoid irritation for better hygiene and comfort.

settings.text_zGATfo1OVGM5d8H12: How do I properly care for my thongs?
settings.text_FZkCB1C4tefzNcZE2:
Hand wash - for maximum care

Under warm water, gently hand wash your thongs using a mild, enzyme free and perfume free detergent. Once done, leave to air dry.

Machine wash

If you choose to machine wash we recommend popping your thongs into a mesh bag for delicates and using a mild, enzyme free and perfume free detergent on a delicate (cold) setting. Avoid using fabric softener and bleach.
settings.text_zGATfo1OVGM5d8H13: Are they only designed to wear under leggings to work out in?

Whether you‚Äôre wearing tight jeans, leggings, or form-fitting dresses, the thong ensures a smooth, flawless silhouette so you can step out with confidence. No awkward adjustments, no second-guessing your outfit.

Crafted with ultra-soft, breathable, and moisture-wicking fabric, it keeps you comfortable during long days at work, errands, or even travel. The thong stays in place and feels so natural, you‚Äôll forget it‚Äôs even there.

Wardrobe Versatility
From casual brunches to nights out, this thong works seamlessly with any style, be it bodycon dresses, skirts, or yoga pants. It eliminates visible lines and prevents wardrobe malfunctions, so you‚Äôre always photo-ready.

Distraction-Free Lifestyle
No matter what your day throws at you, whether you‚Äôre chasing after kids, sitting through meetings, or dancing at a party, you‚Äôll stay focused on living your best life without worrying about discomfort or embarrassing mishaps.

Our thong is a solution for every aspect of your day, not just for your workouts. It‚Äôs designed to fit into your lifestyle effortlessly, giving you the freedom to wear what you want, when you want, without limits.
